title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 347.2 - Notification of amount due
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 347.2 - Notification of amount due

State Regulations

On or before November 15, 1989, in addition to the amount due
for the current year billing and for the payment of the amortized annual
installment, the Comptroller shall advise each participating employer of the
total amortization amount due and be authorized to accept prepayment in full of
said amount by December 15, 1989. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
347.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
